text: he eemaan vaalo! us vyakti ke samaan upakaar jataakar tatha duhkh dekar, apane daanon ko vyarth na karo, jo logon ko dikhaane ke lie daan karata hai aur allaah tatha antim din (paralok) par eemaan nahin rakhata. usaka udaaharan us chatel patthar jaisa hai, jisapar mittee padee ho aur usapar ghor varsha ho jaaye aur us (patthar) ko chatel chhod de. ve apanee kamaee ka kuchh bhee na pa sakenge aur allaah kaafiron ko seedhee dagar nahin dikhaata
